TopicTitle: I can't believe how great this game is :)

Articles.Content:
This is actually one of the most entertaining games I\'ve played. I find myself saying 'just one more launch, I want to test this rocket idea, then I\'ll go to bed', that one more launch usually ends up being 20 more

As much fun as I\'m having with the game I do like the look of some of the add ons as well. Can anyone point me towards some that are not over powered? I dont really want to make the game easier, I\'d just like to have more options. And I know from adding mods in Oblivion and Fallout 3 that mods can easily overpower a game.

Thanks.

And great game!!!

Welcome to Ksp Forums

Yea this game one of my personal favourites and i cant wait until everything is implemented

Nova Silisko\'s mod is perfect but you have to change all your parts so that it isnt overpowered

Also C7 Spaceplane parts

Be careful the time you spend on KSP can start to disrupt your work ethic and it can routinely get under the skin of your significant other.

Oh and when you start to have dreams of building rockets or seeing rocket parts in the everyday objects around you, you have truly become a kerbalnaut!!

Best of Luck!

This is such a supportive community you are going to be pleasantly surprised,

RRs

Thanks guys!

Thank\'s, I\'ll give those mods a shot.

And yeah, I was thinking about how to make a rocket to get to the moon all day at work today

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky
